about_the_game:
Grassroots Football is a game that depicts the appeal of grassroots football, which is not the glamorous arena of professional football, but rather a game that is enjoyed in the community and among friends. Brilliant techniques and flashy goals are nice, but the most important thing is fun.

In this game, a casual football experience that anyone can easily play is waiting for you.

features

Rediscover the fun of football

Casual football with nostalgic friends. Experience the simple but profound origins of football.

Various game modes

There are a variety of ways to enjoy the game, from solo play to exciting multiplayer with friends, from 1 vs 1 up to 11 vs 11 with irregular matches such as 1 vs 2, allowing you to enjoy the game in any style you want.

Growth x Rogue Lite.

Use items earned in matches to develop your players! New discoveries and challenges await you every time you play.

Community building

Gather friends, form teams and find opponents. With an emphasis on community building amongst players, Grassroots Football is not only a place to play, but also a place to bond with new friends.

Intuitive pointer controls.

You can freely specify where the players go and where to kick the ball!

You can enjoy a simple yet profound sense of control.

The ball is at your feet...

Rediscover the joy of football with Grassroots Football. Whether it's the joy of scoring a goal or spending time with your mates, every moment is a special moment.

So, see you on the pitch!

name: GrassrootsFootball
short_description: This game captures the fun of "grassroots football." Play solo or multiplayer matches, from 1v1 to 11v11. Develop your players using items earned in matches and connect with others to build a community. Enjoy intuitive controls and rediscover the true joy of football!
